values: this is a better update than the last one because it contains more words than the last one and UH OH i just got booted offline so im going to keep typing until my dad gets off the phone with my brother and then the internet reconnects lallalalal so yeah i am typing and this is my livejournal its pretty awesome i dont write in it very often OK back online. bye. jon.

for anyone that doesnt know, i cut my hair off around new years.

i should probably post in here more often....

w00t

so now i have no job. fuckin a. this is just great... steph owes me more money than i have to my name right now. anyone know somewhere that i can get a job? making like... $324463 an hour maybe? thatd be nice. i need to get out of here. my house... this town... state... area... but i dont know where i would go seeing as im not so good on the people skills and im broke. fabulous! trapped once again the band is even going to shit. matt and i discussed it this evening. we havent played in like 4 months. what the fuck kind of band is that. im about ready to give up on music shit. ive got a good several thousand dollars into my music gear... blah blah blah im going to continue bitching ive been single for a good year now, without even a prospect. what the fucks up with that? apparantly i just AM that much of a failure. that or no one wants to date someone who looks like jesus. either way, what the fuck? ive got my car and no money so if anyone wants to pay me for gas i will bring them places. i have nothing else to do now. 100% free time other than community service and drug classes for my arrest. fucking cops. so the best part of all of this, is because i got arrested, i had to drop a semesters tuition cost on court and the classes, and now i lost my job. so without my job i have no way to earn that money back to pay for school, and if im not going to school i have to get my own health insurance, which i was going to get through wal mart... but guess what! no more wal mart. no insurance. no medication. means i wont be able to drive again in a few months when my parents insurance drops me. aint that just dandy? so yeah. fuck this shit, im pretty sick of everything from school to work to music to friends to girlfriends to pretty much everything i can think of. someone please find me something to be excited about besides getting completely cocked, cause god knows i wish i could spend everyday in a drunken stupor right now. because im about to give up.

thats right, i am not dead.  i figured maybe i should use this thing again or something... i dunno. its late at night and i am bored. i get my car back in less than i week (monday the 22nd), but i also go to court that day :(.  so yeah.  people should like, comment and stuff. maybe i will use this more.

bow chicka wow wow

i'm a bit bored and whatnot.  its late.  ive been hanging out with cait a lot, it has been quite a good time.  we did all kinds of fun things like buy a tent at wal mart at 1 am and go camping, and find cait a job, and band practice, and lots else but in my current state of mind im a bit lazy.

and my throat hurts.

biznatch.

and im hanging ou t with cait again tomorrow night

we's is best friendses

im gonna go to bed now

soooo letterboxing at night, is totally the way to go.

just thought y'all should know that.

and im going again tomorrow during the day.

and then theres the reunion OHL band practice.  thats right.

later.

im wicked drunk 
andsabrina is cute.

im really lonsely so i think everyone soudl ahng out with winth me.

im gonna play the abss and sit here for now auntil i have to go to wqork at walkmart

bye!@@

superstar!

yep, watched that movie this evening with sabrina.  twas a good time.  got to hang out at her dads house and eat dominos pizza (shitty place to work, but good pizza nontheless).  beans gonna be in the production at the bradley soon (of JCS).  as i said, twas a good time.

the last 2 nights i spent at stephs house,  but i said i was at matts house cause my parents are crazy like that.  saturday, lindsay and carissa hung out but then went home, but last night nate and carissa slept over too (which meant that i got to sleep on the floor... dammit.) oh well, it was a good time.  we got to watch good movies (including the wedding singer), and steph told me every detail of her love life... because she was upset about what was going on downstairs.

also today... i bought a bass cabinet.  its kinda huge... and really loud.  but thats okay, i like it that way.  now i just have to get it into the house.. hmm.

later.

so, believe it or not, the rumored 'satellite sphinx' did indeed practice today, well. we tried.  matt couldnt come, due to stupid parent problems... so we cant blame him. stupid parents.  we played our two songs without him, and tried to sort of do a new one.  yep.

also in attendance (besides jeff and john) were andrea (jeffs girlfriend) and nicole (andreas sister, johns girlfriend), and sabrina (gets something in parentheses too).  after band practice, everyone left but sabrina, who hung out and played some guitar, violin, harmonica, looked at stupid pictures, and watched some aqua teen hunger force ('twas a good time).  then my dad brought her home cause im dumb and have no car :(.

thats about that.  now i am here.

later

i do not want to go to work.

i want to go on jeffs boat with the cool kids.

:-(

so, i spent all day at wal mart today.  i think people should visit me more. yes, visit me. i command it.

there were a few highlights today, heres the most exciting:

first and foremost, there was a sighting of the rare and mighty BRENDA (of the HEATH category) at, who would have guessed, the wal mart snack bar.  she lumbered by on her way to the counter to purchase some sort of fatty food product.  wow.

i also saw like 3 of my old teachers from high school.  that was a blast.

and i saw maureen, shes cool.  she skipped beans concert though (which i also missed due to wal mart, sadly)  

thats about all that happened today.  perhaps tomorrow will be better... i hope i can find a ride at 6 to go do SOMETHING, preferably with people, and not man eating gerbils. and not at wal mart. ive had too much wal mart lately... it cant be healthy.  i find myself praising sam walton by accident, frightening.

later.

so i havent updated this in a DAMN long time.  so i am right now.

my life recently has consisted of a whole lot of working at wal mart.  (its fun i swear)  that and doing various random things.  heres some of the non wal mart related stuff i have done recently (but not too far back cause i have a bad memory)

on friday i hung out at stephs house, it was a good time.  carissa, sabrina, and nate were there.  we got drunk.  saw some girl i sort of knew like 3 years ago who somehow recognized me, which is odd.  oh well.

wal mart

wal mart

on monday i hung out with bean and watched lock stock and two smoking barrels (an excellent movie).  then, she had to go to play practice. so we walked to the bradley, then i went to savage and hung out for a bit, and then michelle and sam met me in downtown putnam, where we waited for bean to ge tout of practice, and then we went to the courthouse and ate.  note: mexican pizza from the courthouse is supurb.

more wal mart

today sabrina and i chilled again, and watched snatch, the not-so-much-a-sequel to the one we watched monday.  then.... played some guitar.  then i was forced to sing a few songs.  sabrina says i should try out for jesus, in jesus christ superstar at the bradley, but i dunno.  also, i work second shift. so. yeah.  so yeah i tried to sing. and then... sabrina made tea, and we walked to phs cause she had jazz band, and had a reminiscent chat on the way.  then my dad was 30 minutes late to pick me up (hes cool like that), and now i am here. sitting, doing nothing as usual.  blehhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh i need to get a car.  26 days till i can drive.  seems like a long time...  i also get a raise then though.  thatll be nice.

aiight, im hungry. so i think im gonna go do something about that.  i smell tacos in my near future.

oh yeah, and im gonna try to update this all the time again, for you people who read it everyday and whatnot. *cough*

ok bye.

so you know what sucks?

our journals were due like monday. or maybe today.  and thats the main, semester long project, for communications class.  that and our speeches, which are probably due today.  soooo whos fucked?  i am fucked.  so is erin, but not quite as bad.  and matt. but hes always fucked.

yay

bye

i am at the cool downstairs computer lab at QVCC, YES, it exists. i had no idea.  its quite warm in here since its the size of a large closet and has like 30 computers running inside.  erin and i were going to work on our journal entries which are indeed due this wednesday..... but i think we are slipping away from that goal.  so yeah.  i worked yesterday, and it sucked cause it was busy. but at least i dont have to work today cause its gonna get really really hot out (ick.)  soooooo yeah.  so i have to get back to doing... well... nothing.

so.... i'm single. also lonely.  so leave me a comment if you are also available.  (i doubt that this will work but hey, what the hell)  

yes, it is actually what time the entry says it is, like 3:50 or something insane like that.  why? because i am insane.  and i did infact battle wireless networks and ladybug attacks to bring you guys this entry. so be grateful, dammit.

ummmmm i dont really have anything else to say.  i am still awake cause i cant sleep cause i keep getting attacted my ladybugs as they have overrun my room.  and my wireless network seems to work randomly when i DONT need it to (like right now, at 4 AM)... it never works during the day or at any sane time.  and its working perfectly now but once morning rolls around, it will be fucked again. i dont understand.  oh well.  

i hope you burn in hell, or your religions eqivalent of hell. or... fuck it.  i hope you burn to death, in a volcano.  that way it applies to anyone.  no, im not saying that everyone should die in a ball of fire.  just a select few who know who they are.  and i doubt they even read this.

so  anyway.


i got a new guitar.  it is in fact a very old guitar.  32 years old actually. a 1972 gibson "sg professional" to be exact.  and its a little bit fucked up, so if anyone knows of a place i can get it fixed, lemme know.  its red and black if you wanted to know.

i think thats enough middle of the night rambling for now.  oh yeah, sunday night i had two seizures and was in the ER for a while.  means i cant drive for a month or two, but other than that its not really a big deal.  so stop asking me if im feeling better.

piss off.

so its been a while since i posted anything... SORRY to all you people who READ my journal CONSTANTLY.  i know it is a major component of your life, and you must have been quite bored lately. so here is a new entry for ya'll.

so today we had band practice, and jeff is joinging the band to play bass (fuckin sweet) so our band is no longer underequipped :-D  and we finished recording out demo, which we have to send out ASAP to get into a show at lupos coming up pretty soon. yay! everyone should love us. let me know if you want to hear the new music, i have mp3s.

so other than that my life has been uneventful and full of WAL MART.  and i got my first paycheck.  and i only make 5 cents per hour less than matt.  oh snap.

so that is all.
bye.

i am heading to WORK in about 20 mins.  hopefully i will be off of the register again today... got to do that yesterday, and its so much better. register sucks....

lataz.

so it is 1 am, i am working at 3 pm tomorrow, BITCHES. at wonderful wal mart.  who WOULDNT let me work today, BITCHES.  so yeah, i will be workin the L & G cash register from 3 till close tomorrow night, and y'all should come visit me now, ya'ear?  i suck so much.


so tonight me, matt, and john recorded the drums for our SECOND new song for the new band (which has 3ish songs so far).  we are trying to toss together a 2 song demo to send to places to try to book shows.  even though we.... dont have a bassist. or anything.  oh well.


on another note, erin sucks cause shes in florida and i want to be, so just like everyone who has something i want, she sucks.  (not really, shes cool.  shh.)

on another note, i sold my red guitar for $300 to my buddy holly (hahaha.)  yes, my friend, named holly.  and i am immediately spending that money and buying myself a ca... i mean, another guitar.  woo hoo! its fuckin sweet though.  1972 gibson sg pro, for under 300 bucks.  :-D  i rule!!! woo hoo!!


and... i'm spent.  oh yeah, i also only got 4 hours sleep last night, so i need to sleep now.  

BYE BYE!

i go sleep now.  hee hee.  i have to wake up at 6.  FUCKIN A MAN.  oh well.  later.







yes, this post was entirely unessesary.

so, i just got home from business law class (an hour ago), take home test due monday. fun fun time.

i should be going to bed, cause i have to be at work at 7 tomorrow mornign so i have to get up at like 6... fuckin a.

so this is not a good way to start out my wal mart career.... not a fan of waking up at 6.  oh well.  EVERYONE should come to putnam wal mart tomorrow and buy something in the garden center. before 4. and if im not there, check elsewhere. i am there SOMEWHERE.  

blah blah blah.  i wish i had a car.  everyone should hang out with me tomorrow afternoon, all at once. 4 o clock, wal mart. pick me up. all of you. all of my loyal fans. oh shit, idont have fans. fuck.

later.




ps: i am a hoe expert.

so today wasnt such a bad day, i feel suprisingly good. i am not sure why.  lets see.

as usual erin picked me up in the morning and we went to communications (i really should thank her more often for the rides, since shes always on time and otherwise getting to school would be a bitch) and that was generally fun and not so bad.  we worked on purpose statements for our big speech.  i thought of mine in the parking lot at school.

after that, matt and erin decided they werent going to class, and i decided english was hopeless, so i filled out another add/drop form and went in search of my super cool teacher, Julius.  i finally found him when he pranced into his office at about 12.  so after that, we all went to burger king to get lunch since its the only place that has veggie burgers for erin.  then matt had to work so we brought him back to his car at school and then headed to erins house.

on the way there, her cd player started freaking out, so we made it a plan to fix the stupid thing while we were there.  i also tried to fix her computer, but was semi unsucessful.  its being kind of a bitch.  but we did manage to fix the cd player i think, i reconnected a wire and straightened it out so that her dashboard is no longer hanging off like it was before.  so no more rattleing on the highway.  it then proceeded to be dumb... but then stopped. *knock on wood*  

so then, erin had to do some shopping.  not just any kind of shopping, she had to do some bathing suit shopping.  i of course, was totally up for that as i take great interest in womens clothing... *cough*... what?  so she managed to extort $40 from her parents and we headed up to target since they supposedly had one there that she liked.  well first we stopped at my house to get cds and my cell phone, but THEN we went to target.  of course, they didnt have it in her size, and there were no other super cool ones there. so we went next door to coles, and after much hunting she found a suitable replacement for a whopping $44 on sale.  so then we headed back towards webster, and listened to some led zeppelin.  we were busy talkinga bout something and missed the proper exit (2) and were forced to get off at 1 and backtrack to get gas. *sigh*.  so then she had to go to a doctors appointment with her mom at 7 so she dropped me off here, just moments ago. 

my parents should be home soon, i think we are having left over tacos for dinner, and then i have to go back to QV for my class at 8 (business law), one of the 2 classes i have left... hmm. so yeah.  that ends at 9:30, at which point i am probably gonna come home and just go to BED since i have to be at wal mart at fuckin 7 tomorrow for cashier training and CBL (computer based learning).  apparantly im late with that... shit. i need a car.  i  can do it whenever... i just have no way to get to wal mart.  DAMN me for not having a car *kicks self*.  so i might buy my grandfathers super cool escort wagon, its green, and a standard.  but i fucking hate fords, so i dunno.  i would rather buy scotts fucked up golf and get it fixed.  (hey, i have a parts car already)

that is all for now.

to that i say... yeah right.

soo... i dont really like living with my parents, they kind of piss me off.  but i dont know where else i could live, since i have no money.  soon i will be working at wal mart though. money? move out? i dunno.

also, i am sucking at school.  i dropped math cause i hadnt been in over a month, and i am pretty sure that tomorrow i will be dropping english since its my last chance to do so and it looks pretty hopeless. leaving me with 2 classes, which is 6 credits.  so hopefully i wont get dropped from my parents insurance.  if i do, oh well, its not like i have a car to drive anyway.

lets see. so if i can get full time at wal mart, it will suck.  but i should be able to rake in almost $250 a week.  which means, that maybe i actually could move out.  and maybe i could get my own apartment, and live by myself and hate everyone from a distance.  at least for a while till i finally decide its time to give up on this whole hating people thing, and this whole trying to do something with my life thing.  it seems like its probably not going anywhere.

i was looking at this school called musictech college. its in minnesota.  seems that i could go there and get a degree in music production. thatd be cool, but first i would have to get in.  hahahahaa. right.  whats my gpa? oh yeah... somewhere between 0.67 and 3.0  whats that?  hmm something like a ... 2.25 or something.  oh boy.

so i finished recording our one song today, definately not happy with it.  the sound card on my computer sucks, so it came out shitty. i kind of want to do it all over again.  because its really shitty.  not that matt sang bad, or i fucked it up, it just sounds bad, cause my sound card is a piece of shit.  

so, im selling my red guitar to hollis taylor i think, for 300, which is pretty cool cause maybe then i can buy an interface for my computer and redo the whole recording. of our one song. that i am starting to hate.  or maybe i could write something new... oh wait. nope.

i was supposed to write a purpose statement for communications. and do the paper that was due wednesday. didnt so much do either.  i think im gonna do the purpose statement when i get to class tomorrow, then drop english, then do the communications paper and bring it in wednesday, maybe. i dunno.  it seems kinda futile.  i should pass that class though, its not so bad.  that and business law. my teacher is pretty cool.  

so im listening to elliott smith, its some good stuff.  certainly doesnt cheer me up at all though.

so whats with girls around here and me being everyones friend and everyones guy to talk to about guy problems?  gettin kinda lonely so if anyone likes me youre gonna have to let me know cause im not catching any signals from anyone and its kinda sucking.  :-/ if your looking for me im probably hanging out with matt seeing as thats all i ever do these days.  go to school (not to class), play pool, then hang out with matt and/or erin, and then go home and wish i wasnt at home.  when really its not like theres anything else to do anyway.  

i kinda wish i was drunk. all the time. itd make everything suck a little bit less. i gotta work on that, the getting drunk, or something

go away.

so i am kinda bored, its nearly three am, and im just hanging out as usual. i definately slept till 5:30 today so i am not tired at all, dammit.  

yesterday i went to center pizza with matt and erin and chris (my brother) and then we all went to johnny d's house to drop off a cd, which turned into hanging out there for a while.  and then erin had to get her car, and chris didnt want to go to savage, so matt went to bring them home.  i stayed at johns because of 1. lack of seating in the car and 2. johan and i had some music stuff to work on.  so we did that, we have a cool new song that has some linear drumming in it, sounds nifty.  so then erin and matt came back and we all went to savage (oh what a wonderful place).  we didnt actually go in, cause it was just a bunch of shitty metal bands, instead we played lacrosse int he parking lot and hung out with roland and some other people.  i take that back, i did go in once, but it was only to take a piss.  so yeah.. then erin had to go home cause of her cerfew and whatnot, and matt and i... well. we went to this party and met steph there, who was completely... i mean... COMPLETELY inebriated.  beyond drunk.  by the time we convinced her to let us drive her home she couldnt even walk to the car.  so that was interesting... after that we drove around.. went to bickfords, matt dropped 13 bucks on a steak, then we drove around some more and i think we eventually wound up in sturbridge, and then got home at like 5ish.  so then i took some nyquil and went to bed
-- flash foreward 12 hours--
5:30 pm today, my mom wakes me up, says erin called half an hour ago, so i try to call her back but shes not there... so then i get in the shower, and she calls back right as i am getting out to say that although she wasnt sposed to be working... and called in to make sure she wasnt... they then called her in, so she was on her way there.. so i just hung out for a while. and then at 8 i called matt and since my dad was going to wal mart anyway i went there with them and met mat there. and we went to his casa to hang out and whatnot.  so we... hung out for a few mins, played gutiar, erin called on her break. then matt went to take a shwoer, and i started playing need for speed underground.  at which point erin called back cause she got outa work early.  so she began on her journey over to matts, still wearing her work clothes since she couldnt go home without being stuck there.. so then we all hung out for a few mins before we decided to watch pulp fiction (good movie).  unfortunately, erin was not a fan of all the needles, and had to be home at 1, so she left about halfway through, missing a lot of the great parts. *sigh* she shall have to watch it again. so then matt and i finished watching that, and he brought me home, and here i am being an insomniac again. YAY

so thats my story and i'm stickin to it.

ummmmmmmmm so since i have nothing interesting to talk about other than telling my life story, thats probably all you're gonna get for a while for anyone who reads this, at least until something interesting happens to me.

later

blehhhhhhhhh dont wanna go to school blehhhhhhhhhhh

blehhhhhhhh didnt do my paper blehhhhhhhhhh

BLEHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

ok im done.

[nerd moment] dont ever buy a 802.11b USB wireless adapter from d-link if you are trying to set up an ad-hoc network with another computer that doesnt have a d-link adapter.  [/nerd moment]


so its 4 am and i might finally have my network up and running.  well its working but im not sure for how long.  it seems that if i restart one of the computers i have to spend hours fiddling with it to get it to reconfigure. fuckin sonofabitch.  maybe i will sell it on ebay and buy something else.  like a really long network cable.  while that would be annoying, at least it would fuckin work.


ANYWAY....

so im wicked fuckin tired, and i have to fill out a form so i can drop fuckin math since im failing it... gotta do that tomorrow! someone remind me.  

and... its 4 am and im sitting here playing matts bass cause im trying to adjust the neck so it plays right again... *yawn*

oh yeah, and i put a deposit on a guitar today so if anyone wants to buy my red SG, let me know.

later.

yes, i am a complete loser.  i definately stayed up till now.... which is like 4 am, trying to get my wireless network to work properly.  i FINALLY got it. i think. *knock on wood*.  soooo theres not even anyone else awake, my neck is killing me, still have a nice headache from getting boozed up last night, and... yeah. soooo i think i might go to sleep now, since i have to wake up at 9 cause erins picking me up at 10.  hmmm my cell just beeped, i guess she left me a message at 10:30... :-/  sowwie.... i hate living in places with no cell phone reception. oh well. i shall see her in 6 hours so its okay. :-D.  i really should sleep since i didnt really last night, and i was hungover this morning.  ohhhhhhhhhh good.  and i just ate cookies so i have energy now. fuckin a.  oh well.  people should call me.  anyone going to wal mart tomorrow? gimme a call... i have to be there at 5ish for something but i dont have a car *yay*  oh yeah, and i totally didnt do my take home test thats definately due tomorrow at 8 pm.  fuckin shit ass bitch!

goodnight all

im kinda tired, and ... yeah.  'twas an interesting night last night to say the least.  ******i drank 7 or 8 beers, not really sure what happened between like 1 and 2 last night, all i really remember from that hour is puking but apparantly lots of other stuff happened...**********

i'm feeling kind of uninspired.  perhaps i shall post later. ***********i dont feel well******

bleh.  someone wanna hang out later?  ************after my headache goes away (thanks erin, newbury comics and starbucks was wicked cool***********

************ so i updated this and added the stuff with stars. hahaha. ****************

why the hell arent there any competant musicians around here?  DOES ANYONE PLAY BASS? DOES ANYONE PLAY KEYBOARDS?  come on now, what the fuck!  i am really quite sick of this.  and why the hell cant i write anything good anymore... oh thats right... thats cause i never get to PLAY anymore.

this place fuckin sucks.  i wish i was back in new york, at least i'd be in a band back there, and at least my parents wouldnt be being assholes ever 5 seconds, telling me that suddenly i have to pay them 6 grand for last semester... the part of last semester that they paid for. ohhhhhhh good. and i am supposedly supposed to do that before i buy a car.  right.  

so, anyone want to get an apartment? im gonna need a few roommates to split the cost with.  seems like a good plan to me right now.  sell all my fucking shit that i dont need, and move the fuck out of here.

i hate northeast CT and 98% of the people who live here. 

goodnight.

for adam sandler movies that dont completely suck (like every other one i have seen).  so yay i found something to do tonight.  me, matt, nate, sean, paul, shannon, etc etc etc all went to worcester to see 50 1st dates, which was suprisingly not bad.  and then i came home.  not without experiencing a shannon "oh my god that was so sad" sobbing session though.  i feel bad for nate, he drove her back to putnam from worcester.  :-D

and its time for bed or to sit here and not sleep.

later.

sooooo i have nothing to do tonight.... so im just... sitting at home... fuckin sweet.

later
jon

currently i am chillin in the learning center.  on the computer  with the shitty spacebar again.   yep.... walmart hired me! i shall be doing cashier work in the garden center, so come buy some rakes and tomato seeds from me. DO IT!!!.   okay.  and i need something to do tonight, so people should call me.  aiight. later

jon
and now, the day of judgement is upon us.  in 30 mins i will begin my interview at wal mart... everyone should pray to the wal mart gods that they hire me, because i am REALLY poor. eeeeep.

so ive come to the conclusion im kind of a loser.  tomorrow at 9:30 am i will be interviewing (aka begging) for a job at wal mart. mixing paint.  or unloading trucks.  thats so sad. but i am wicked poor, and i have no car, and no life. so i guess it works.  blehhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

band practice was... meh.  it always feels so unproductive because we lack all the necessary intruments... so it just sounds thin.... i am growing to hate the sound of just drums and guitar, we need fucking bass and keys before i kill something. RAR.  so yeah that sax part i wrote sounded cool by itself, but clashes horribly with matts vocal melody... time to rewrite that one.  also, i dont know how to play wind instruments so i kinda didnt include any rests for breathing and whatnot.... hmmmmm.... i dunno.  ithink maybe andrea should try writing those, once we map out the vocal melody for her to go on.  so yeah... we did that.

then afterwards, me, john, and erin went to mcdonalds and sat around for oh... .2hours or so.... talked about various "stuff" and "things", it was quite interesting.  at one point john said something like "its snowing in napkin land!" and tossed napkins all over the table. 

to me, at that moment, that was the single funniest thing in the whole world and i laughed so hard and so long i thought i was gonna throw up my cheeseburger.  mmmm.

but then we had no lives so erin went home and we dropped john off. matt and i then went on our quest for something to do.

by reading this, you will be able to have ALMOST as much fun as actually being there, without the risk of death or dismemberment.

1.  call a few people... while driving all around putnam.  that gets old
2.  drive to rhode island (for about 2-3 miles) and then turn around
3.  follow car from rhode island on back roads all the way to their driveway in thompson.  stop in front of their driveway and stare for a few seconds... then drive away.
4.  we went to webster, drove around, then went to
5.  dudley, then got
